text: 2022 Madrid explosion occurred on May 6, 2022, after a gas accumulation in Madrid, Spain. Two people were killed and 19 others injured. == Background == Many explosions have occurred in the Spanish capital, including a similar one in 2021. == Events == Before the explosion, several neighbors smelled a strong odor of gas. The explosion occurred after 1:00 p.m., in the Barrio de Salamanca in Madrid. At 7:00 p.m., the two people who were killed, both male workers, were identified. == References == Category:2022 disasters in Europe 2022 explosion Category:Disasters in Spain Category:Explosions in Europe Category:May 2022 events Category:Explosions in 2022 Category:2022 in Spain
title: 2022 Madrid explosion
